001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.ConfigSource;
004import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig;
005import org.aeonbits.owner.Config;
006
007/**
008 * Configuration interface for UI framework settings.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface defines configurable properties for the UI testing framework,
011 * allowing users to manage settings such as screenshot behavior upon test success.
012 * The configurations are loaded from system properties and a specified properties file.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016@ConfigSource("ui-framework-config")
017@Config.LoadPolicy(Config.LoadType.MERGE)
018@Config.Sources({"system:properties", "classpath:${ui.config.file}.properties"})
019public interface UiFrameworkConfig extends PropertyConfig {
020
021   /**
022    * Determines whether a screenshot should be taken when a test passes.
023    *
024    * <p>Default value: {@code false}.
025    *
026    * @return {@code true} if a screenshot should be taken on a passed test, {@code false} otherwise.
027    */
028   @DefaultValue("false")
029   @Key("screenshot.on.passed.test")
030   boolean makeScreenshotOnPassedTest();
031
032}
